rule.name: Don't pass other class to LoggerFactory.
rule.description: You have to pass the Class which you're coding about to LoggerFactory#getLogger(Class).

rule.name: Don't publish Logger.
rule.description: You have to make your all logger to private.

rule.name: Logger should be final.
rule.description: Your all logger should be final.

rule.name: Don't static logger.
rule.description: The SLF4J community recommends to use non-static logger. See official FAQ at http://www.slf4j.org/faq.html#declared_static
